summary.para: The MSV1_0_SUBAUTH_RESPONSE structure contains the response from a subauthentication package.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUBAUTH_RESPONSE.MessageType
member.summary: value identifying the type of request being made. This member must be set to MsV1_0SubAuth.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUBAUTH_RESPONSE.SubAuthInfoLength
member.summary: Indicates the length, in bytes, of the buffer returned by SubAuthReturnBuffer.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUBAUTH_RESPONSE.SubAuthReturnBuffer
member.summary: Contains the subauthentication package response. The format and content of this buffer is specific to the subauthentication package. For more information, see the documentation for specific subauthentication packages.
